Title: Three Men and a Baby
Author: Jim Cruickshank  James Orr  Colline Serreau

Replies.Reply: The blonde over there, she's too gorgeous for words. Just look at those eyes, look at those shoulders and the way she moves.
Hello.   I'm the captain of this plane.   May I ask your name?
Listen, Jane, I've seen many beautiful women in my life but I swear to you, I've never, ever met a woman as exquisite as you are.
Jane, can you feel my heart? It's pounding. This is horrible, I think I'm gonna faint. Listen: I'm madly in love with you, I'm single and here's my phone number.
I'm putting my fate in your hands.
No, I'm not.
I got her phone number!   She gave me her phone number!
It's wonderful -- Life is wonderful!
God, what a woman!
Wanna share a cab?
Come over to my place tonight.
This is no line and I'm not trying to get you into bed. This is something completely different.
I'm having a hard time.    I'm working on two at once.
Clementine -- she's waiting for me in the den.
You're a lifesaver, Paul. I thought I'd never get away.
Clementine.
Yeah, sure, of course.
No, wait, I'm leaving for South America tomorrow. I'll be gone for three weeks.
But it's okay. Peter and Michael will be here. They'll take care of it.
Absolutely.   Don't worry about a thing.
Delivered Sunday picked up Thursday. Got it. No problem.
Don't mention it.
Uh-oh.   Too late.
Oh my darling, oh my darling, oh my darling Clementine.
Sorry I can't give you guys a hand, but I've got something cooking.
Maxine.    Beautiful, enchanting Maxine.
Hey, Michael -- how'd it go with Rosalie?
Your old friend Sophia appeared and dragged you into a thrilling conversation about modern art and in the meantime Rosalie took off with someone else.
Don't worry, I'll leave you her phone number on the hall table.
Damn! I forgot to tell them about the package!
I gotta make a quick phone call.
Oh, c'mon, I've really got to make a phone call! What do you think I'm going to do, pick up one of the New Jersey delegates to the I.B.M. convention?
Peter!    Michael! Are you here?
Oh, my God! My beautiful room!
What the hell is going on around here? What happened to this place?
And anyway, what the hell are you  76.
Oh, I get it. The    'silent' treatment!
I paid to have this place decorated, too, you know. I'm not going to let you get away with this.
It's too late to try and talk me out of it. I'm history. I'm gone.
And that's another thing! I will not have a baby in this house!
Hey, will you please stop talking like Mr. Rogers? It's getting on my nerves.
What?
What are you guys talking about?
What??
It's ridiculous. I look ridiculous.
He should try South America.
Paul, hi, it's Jack! Hey, listen, I brought you back a little present from South America. Can I see you right away so I can give it to you?
That was for your 'little' package, and consider yourself lucky I didn't turn you in to the cops!
Crawl.
Shit! That bitch hung up on me!
Replies.Didascalie: (CONT'D) (he slams the receiver down like he was hammering a nail)

That's some magnificent view, isn't it?

I'm sure the dope was in the diaper.
I'm sure the dope was in the diaper.
